channel.title: CVE Feed for OpenHarmony -- OpenHarmony
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OpenHarmony -- OpenHarmony

item.title: CVE-2022-38081|2024-09-16T20:26:45.986Z -- openharmony -- openharmony
item.description: OpenHarmony-v3.1.2 and prior versions have a permission bypass vulnerability. LAN attackers can bypass the distributed permission control.To take advantage of this weakness, attackers need another vulnerability to obtain system.

item.title: CVE-2022-38064|2024-09-16T18:07:49.771Z -- openharmony -- openharmony
item.description: OpenHarmony-v3.1.2 and prior versions have a permission bypass vulnerability. Local attackers can bypass permission control and get sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2022-42463|2024-09-16T17:28:40.347Z -- openharmony -- openharmony
item.description: OpenHarmony-v3.1.2 and prior versions have an authenication bypass vulnerability in a callback handler function of Softbus_server in communication subsystem. Attackers can launch attacks on distributed networks by sending Bluetooth rfcomm packets to any remote device and executing arbitrary commands.

item.title: CVE-2022-38700|2024-09-16T16:48:02.064Z -- openharmony -- openharmony
item.description: OpenHarmony-v3.1.1 and prior versions have a permission bypass vulnerability. LAN attackers can bypass permission control and get control of camera service.

item.title: CVE-2022-38701|2024-09-16T19:10:47.330Z -- openharmony -- openharmony
item.description: OpenHarmony-v3.1.2 and prior versions have a heap overflow vulnerability. Local attackers can trigger a heap overflow and get network sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2024-41157|2024-09-02T03:25:17.414Z -- openharmony -- openharmony
item.description: in OpenHarmony v4.1.0 and prior versions allow a local attacker cause the common permission is upgraded to root and sensitive information leak through use after free.

item.title: CVE-2024-38386|2024-09-02T03:25:00.908Z -- openharmony -- openharmony
item.description: in OpenHarmony v4.1.0 and prior versions allow a local attacker arbitrary code execution in pre-installed apps through out-of-bounds write.

item.title: CVE-2024-39612|2024-09-02T03:25:05.302Z -- openharmony -- openharmony
item.description: in OpenHarmony v4.0.0 and prior versions allow a local attacker cause information leak through out-of-bounds Read.

item.description: in OpenHarmony v4.1.0 and prior versions allow a local attacker cause crash through integer overflow.
